content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Setup (Position x=1-3, y=1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests storing iron plates at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5)

### Copper Smelting Setup (Position x=2-4, y=7)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests storing copper plates at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)

### Research Lab Setup
Consists of:
- Two labs connected to electricity network (id 3673)
- Labs contain automation science packs

### Power Generation System (Position x=2-13, y=35)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (2.5,35.5) outputting water
- Pipe network carrying water at positions (3.5-6.5,33.5-35.5)
- Boiler at position (7,35.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network at positions (8.5-10.5,35.5)
- Steam engine at position (13.5,35.5) generating electricity
- Connected to electricity network (id 3673)

### Electricity Distribution Network (id 3673)
Extensive network of electric poles connecting power generation to labs and other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with research
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again

### Errors with entity placement
- Ensure required entity is in inventory before attempting to place it (e.g., assembling-machine-1)
- Craft required entities before attempting placement

### Unused/Disconnected Structures
- Offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) is not connected to any system and has no fluid present
- Empty wooden chest at (5.5,3.5) with inserter at (5.5,2.5) is not being utilized
